title: Calculating difference?
body:
I think I am in a pickle the home screen ,after clicking the shortcut icon on my computer, won't load correctly nor will the files actually do anything

I have seen the 6,18 help thing and I will look on that more but is there anything anyone can suggest?

replies.body:
A lot of issues during the patching process are caused by either League missing crucial system permissions or a network instability that prevents the client from grabbing files from the server. I recommend working through the steps in our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) as a first step to resolving this.

If those steps caused any change, let me know.
I installed the hextech repair tool ,and I think that helped a lot it's a great tool thank you
I'm glad to hear the Hextech Repair Tool helped you out. Let me know if you encounter issues with this again.

Thank you for your help ,but I just thought about the fact that it could be my internet connection because my other browsers have been sluggish

(I am really sorry I am kinda brain dead right now)
